title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7640.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7640.1 - Policy

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part shall be to ensure that body
imaging scanning equipment is used in correctional facilities to prevent the
entry of contraband, in a manner that ensures for the safety and security of
both incarcerated individuals and facility staff. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7640.1

Adopted

New

York State Register January 10, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 2, eff. 1/10/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
